summary: This script opens a video file with an ASS subtitle file, using mpv player in full screen and without audio. The ASS file contains karaoke effects for the associated video, sourced from pyjom_remote/tests/karaoke_effects/pyonfx_test/examples/2 - Beginner folder.

details.comment: This script opens a video file with an ASS subtitle file, using mpv player in full screen and without audio. The ASS file contains karaoke effects for the associated video, sourced from pyjom_remote/tests/karaoke_effects/pyonfx_test/examples/2 - Beginner folder.
